item.title: Accordion Component Implementation
item.description:
Greetings

Greetings from a passionate beginner front-end engineer. I hope this post finds you healthy and well, and you are progressing toward achieving your goals.

Overview

In order to enhance my front-end development skills—what is more, my React skills—I started the Build 25 React Projects tutorial offered on freeCodeCamp.org by Sangam Mukherjee. In the beginning, I started assuming the copycat role, that is I followed along with the tutor.

Despite the fact the code that the tutor solved the two challenges presented, that is single-selection and multi-selection behaviour, I realized an opportunity to improve the user experience (UX). The problem emerges when switching between states. In particular:
